articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: HP reveals $24,999 hardware created just for Google Beam - The Verge
articles.description: HP has revealed the first third-party hardware built using Google’s 3D video conferencing technology, Beam. The HP Dimension costs $24,999 and features a 65-inch light field display to create a “true-to-life” 3D video of your caller.
articles.content:
The HP Dimension is the first device using Googles 3D video conferencing technology.

articles.title: Elon Musk says he ‘regrets’ social media attacks on Trump - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Tech billionaire says some of his social media posts about the US president ‘went too far’.
articles.content:
Tech billionaire Elon Musk has expressed regret over his broadsides against United States President Donald Trump following their spectacular public falling-out.
